name: Sleep & Dream Tracker Notion Template
description: Welcome to our Sleep & Dream Tracker Notion Template!Our Sleep & Dream Tracker Notion template is the perfect way to keep track of your dreams and sleep quality. It features a dream dictionary, dream journal, and sleep tracker!Our template at a glanceHere is our template at a glance! The template's main page is designed minimally and pleasingly while still having all the necessary information.Sleep Goals: Write out your sleep goals here to remind yourself!Dream Journal: This is where you
features: Sleep Goals:Write out your sleep goals here to remind yourself!; Dream Journal:This is where you can keep a journal of your dreams. It works best if you write down your journal write after you wake up!; Dream Symbol Dictionary:This is where you can keep your resources for various dream symbols. When you have a recurring dream symbol, you can check here for what it means.; Sleep Tracker:The sleep tracker allows you to record your sleep hours, foods, etc... that could contribute to your sleep quality.
